    • Method Detail

      • deserializeJoinCodes

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> deserializeJoinCodes​(java.lang.Boolean lock)
                                                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                                                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        used to access all the joincodes of the users. Joincodes qre used to determine the usertype of a user who is signing up. joincode is similar to license key here
        Parameters:
        lock - takes a lock on server if set to true
        Returns:
        returns hashmap of all joincodes. The value(Int) refers to 2 values, 0 or 1
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - file doesn't exist
        java.io.IOException - Io exception
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - de-serialize issue

      • serializeJoinCode

                                     java.lang.Boolean lock)
        Serialize a Hashmap of Joincodes
        Parameters:
        r - the hashmap to be serialised
        lock - takes a lock on server if set to true

      • generateJoincode

        public java.lang.String generateJoincode​(java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        type - denotes the type(Admin/Faculty/Student) for which join code is to be generated
        Returns:
        returns the randomly generated join code

      • acceptRequest

        public boolean acceptRequest​()
        accepts the top request in the request queue see also deserializeRequestsQueue(Boolean) see also serializeRequestsQueue(PriorityQueue, Boolean)
        Returns:
        true if accepted and false if not able to accept because of time table clashes

      • rejectRequest

        public boolean rejectRequest​()
        rejects the request at top of the queue see alsodeserializeRequestsQueue(Boolean) see alsoserializeRequestsQueue(PriorityQueue, Boolean)
        Returns:
        true if requests gets requested, false for handling empty parameters

      • cancelBooking

        public boolean cancelBooking​(java.time.LocalDate queryDate,
                             int slotID,
                             java.lang.String RoomID)
        allows admin to cancel a reservation
        Parameters:
        queryDate - the date on which reservation is to be cancelled
        slotID - the time slot for the reservation to be cancelled
        RoomID - the room for which reservation has to be cancelled
        Returns:
        true if it is cancelled false otherwise

      • bookRoom

        public boolean bookRoom​(java.time.LocalDate queryDate,
                        int slot,
                        Reservation r)
        allows admin to book a free room on a date in a room
        Parameters:
        queryDate - the date
        slot - the time(30 minute slot)
        r - the reservation object see also Reservation class
        Returns:
        true if booked false otherwise
